summary: An ordinance relating to zoning, establishing Use, Area, and Height Districts for the portions of Sonora, Ravenna, Sand Point, and Ziria Precincts, annnexed to the City of Seattle under Ordinance No. 73879, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto three new sections numbered 2-140, 10-6 and 17-103, respectively.
